job_title: Adjunct Instructor in Mars Hill, NC
pros: The students are very respectful and motivated.
cons: Night classes only because of part-time schedule limits enrollment

job_title: IT Intern in Mars Hill, NC
pros: Great experience and hands-on help desk knowledge

job_title: Anonymous Employee in Mars Hill, NC
pros: Family built community, feels like home

job_title: Associate Professor in Mars Hill, NC
pros: Location, scenery, campus is pretty, very talented and collegial faculty and staff.
cons: Dorms and some student spaces needed updating. Plans are underway to do this.

job_title: Graduate Student in Mars Hill, NC
pros: Great place to work, and a great place to go to school.
cons: I do not have any negative remarks.

review_title: Love the wonderful people, not the salary and benefits
job_title: Assistant Professor in Mars Hill, NC
pros: If I were independently wealthy or a single person I never would have left Mars Hill.  You'll never find a more dedicated and supporting group of people.  The scienc eand math facility is gorgeous.
cons: Poor salary and horrible family health insurance plan (worse than independent coverage).  The overload pay was terrible and the budget for supplies was inadequate.

review_title: Administration does not value faculty.  Overworked and Underpaid.
job_title: Assistant Professor in Mars Hill, NC
pros: The faculty at Mars Hill College are highly qualified and wonderful colleagues.
cons: No Salary.  No budget for educational supplies.  Very poor benefits.

job_title: Assistant Professor in Mars Hill, NC
pros: The faculty is totally committed to building relationships and continuing education.
cons: There are no cons in this work environment.
